1 #Button Button

1.1 #Button.PrimarySet Button

Toggle full screen Open in new window Toggle example guides Toggle HTML markup

Your standard button suitable for clicking.

:hover - Highlights when hovering. :disabled - Dims the button when disabled. .primary - Indicates button is the primary action. .smaller - A little bit smaller now.

.button {
  //
  &.primary {
    //
  }
  &.smaller {
    //
  }
  &:hover {
    //
  }
  &:disabled {
    //
  }
}
Example
Markup 
<button class="button ">Button</button>
Source: components/button.less, line 1

1.2 #Button.Invisible Another Button

Toggle full screen Open in new window Toggle example guides Toggle HTML markup

Buttons can and should be clicked.

.button {
  border: none;
  background: @red;
}
Example
Markup: components/button.hbs 
<button class="button {{modifier_class}}">Button</button>
Source: components/button.less, line 51
